description:
#### New package name: **[sumatrapdf.portable](https://chocolatey.org/packages/sumatrapdf.portable)**

---

`sumatrapdf.commandline` has been deprecated because of [Chocolatey naming conventions](https://chocolatey.org/docs/chocolatey-faqs#what-is-the-difference-between-packages-no-suffix-as-compared-toinstallportable).

It exists only for backward compatibility to provide a transitional dummy package for existing users and scripts which may still use this package ID.
summary: Sumatra PDF is a PDF, ePub, MOBI, CHM, XPS, DjVu, CBZ, CBR reader for Windows
author: Krzysztof Kowalczyk
